sumary.title: Sumary
sumary.description: I'm from Rio de Janeiro, I'm 24 years old, I worked for 5 years in the Brazilian Navy. Today I live in São Paulo, Capital Studying the 4th Semester of IT - Systems Development Analysis. I'm good at languages. With English I am self-taught, I learn with series, movies, music, apps and etc, I organize myself to learn new words every day and taking advantage of my gift of learning languages, I am also acquiring knowledge in German and Italian in the future. I am currently a Software Engineering Intern at Cognizant/Ford Motor Company.

education.title: Academic Education
education.university1: Systems Analysis and Developmen - Descomplica Faculdade digital
education.status: High School Diploma - Complete high School

exp.title: Experiences
exp.subTitle1: Software Engineer Intership - Cognizant - Ford Motor Company
exp.function1: Working with: HTML, CSS, JavaScript,TypeScript, Angular, Java, SQL and Spring Boot
exp.function2: Working with: Assistance to cook, Cold food montages, Salad montages, Desserts montages, Cleaning of cafeterias, Interactions of nutritionists and I work on a 6x1 scale from 6am to 2pm
exp.function3: I was enrolled in the Naval Reservists Training Course (CFRN) located on the island of Marambaia, RJ. After graduating, I was able to serve the country, being assigned to serve in the Naval Battalion, Ilha das cobras, RJ, a military organization in which I spent all my 4 years and 9 months. There I worked in the service area in the officers' mess, I dealt with the high echelon of the armed forces from mid-2016 to 2018. In 2018 I completed the adaptation to cook, then becoming a military cook, a role I held until July 2021.

about.title: More about me
about.details1: This is my wife, Beatriz and me
about.details3: My passion for futebol, especially Flamengo is my favorite weekend hobby. This love that I'll take for life
